question: WRITING TASK 1You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.You are going to study in a college in the UK next year. You would like to stay in a college Hall of Residence.Write a letter to the college. In your letterexplain your accommodation requirementsexplain what your food needs areask what alternatives are available if they cannot provide what you wantYou should write at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses. Begin your letter as follows:Dear Sir or Madam,
text: I am going to start my college education next year in the UK. I want to stay in a college Hall of Residence. I would appreciate it If you can give me the information which I need.
I need something not so expensive in the price. Ideally up to 800 pounds per month. I want a single bedroom with a bathroom and a living area with a sofa, tv-screen and a desk with a chair.
Also, I would like to let you know that I do not have any special dietary needs and just need to keep eating healthily, my usual daily nutrient intake must include protein, healthy carbs and fat.
If there is nothing available for my needs at this time what other options you can suggest to me?
Thank you in advance and looking forward to hearing from you back.
